## Form.getBlock() method

Gets the block associated with the specified name.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getBlock(block: string): Block;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  block | string | The name of the block. |

**Returns:**

[Block](./forms42core.block.md)

The Block object associated with the specified name.
